UPDATE SYS_TEST
test_bigint = #{testBigint,jdbcType=BIGINT},
test_gibintn = #{testGibintn,jdbcType=BIGINT},
test_char = #{testChar,jdbcType=CHAR},
test_charn = #{testCharn,jdbcType=CHAR},
test_date = #{testDate,jdbcType=DATE},
test_datetime = #{testDatetime,jdbcType=DATETIME},
test_decimal = #{testDecimal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
test_decimalp = #{testDecimalp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
test_decimalps = #{testDecimalps,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
test_double = #{testDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
test_doublemd = #{testDoublemd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
test_float = #{testFloat,jdbcType=FLOAT},
test_floatp = #{testFloatp,jdbcType=FLOAT},
test_floatmd = #{testFloatmd,jdbcType=FLOAT},
test_int = #{testInt,jdbcType=INT},
test_intn = #{testIntn,jdbcType=INT},
test_time = #{testTime,jdbcType=TIME},
test_timestamp = #{testTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
test_varcharn = #{testVarcharn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tset_text = #{tsetText,jdbcType=TEXT},
test_blob = #{testBlob,jdbcType=BLOB}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
